p: Political impediments to global collaborative networking and a lack of global coordination of funding and efforts were the key challenges encountered [ 1, 15, 20, 21, 27, 33, 42]. Delays in mobilising funding [ 15, 27, 36, 37], with approval sometimes taking longer than the outbreak duration, was a challenge during the H1N1 pandemic in HICs [ 15, 37] and again during the Ebola outbreak in LMICs [ 36].
